name: THE INTERSTATE NATURAL GAS ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA
description: Natural gas pipeline industry trade organization
sampleDescriptions: Issues associated with the siting, permitting, safety, security and construction of interstate natural gas pipelines.

PHMSA reauthorization and other related pipeline safety and security bills; PHMSA regulations and actions related to the natural gas pipeline industry; Nationwide permit issues and regulations; Bills and regulations related to the Natural Gas Act; CEQs National Environmental Policy Act regulations; Issues related to COVID-19 with respect to the natural gas pipeline industry, including PPE; EPA Clean Water Act and Clean Air Act regulations and actions.

EPA Clean Water Act and Clean Air Act regulations and actions.
CEQs National Environmental Policy Act regulations.
Issues related to the use of Nationwide Permits for the natural gas industry.
